content.en: Wavelet analysis: Researchers have been exploring the use of wavelets, a mathematical tool, for identifying and understanding time-varying systems. They have developed various algorithms that utilize wavelets to analyze and model these systems, such as the wavelet operator matrix representation and the multiresolution least squares algorithm. These algorithms allow scientists to gain insights into the behavior and properties of complex systems that change over time.
content.da: Waveletanalyse: Forskere har undersøgt brugen af wavelets, et matematisk værktøj, til at identificere og forstå tidsvarierende systemer. De har udviklet forskellige algoritmer, der bruger wavelets til at analysere og modellere disse systemer, såsom wavelet-operatormatrixrepræsentation og multiresolution mindst mulige kvadraters algoritmen. Disse algoritmer giver forskere mulighed for at få indsigt i adfærden og egenskaberne af komplekse systemer, der ændrer sig over tid.
